post.summary: Create listing on behalf of a user

requestBody.description:
Listing Data & Examples
Create a listing in a single step. Select the correct payload for the category.

🟢 EXAMPLE 1: MOTORCYCLE (With Submission Enabled)
{ 'user_id': 2, 'category_id': 1, 'country_id': 1, 'city_id': 50, 'title': 'Ducati Panigale V4', 'allow_submission': true, 'minimum_bid': 50000, 'contacting_channel': 'phone', 'brand_id': 5, 'model_id': 120, 'year_id': 2024, 'engine': '1103cc', 'mileage': 5000, 'body_condition': 'As New', 'images': ['https://url.com/img1.jpg'] }
🟢 EXAMPLE 2: SPARE PART (Category 2)
{ 'user_id': 2, 'category_id': 2, 'country_id': 1, 'city_id': 50, 'title': 'Akrapovic Exhaust', 'price': 12000, 'contacting_channel': 'chat', 'bike_part_category_id': 3, 'condition': 'new', 'motorcycles': [{'brand_id': 5, 'model_id': 120, 'year_id': 2023}], 'images': ['https://url.com/part.jpg'] }
🟢 EXAMPLE 3: LICENSE PLATE (Category 3)
{ 'user_id': 2, 'category_id': 3, 'country_id': 1, 'city_id': 50, 'title': 'Dubai A 123', 'price': 250000, 'contacting_channel': 'both', 'plate_format_id': 5, 'fields': [{'field_id': 10, 'value': 'A'}, {'field_id': 11, 'value': '123'}] }

post.summary: Create a new SOOM (Submission of Offer on Market)
post.description: Create a new SOOM for a specific listing. Users can submit multiple SOOMs, but each must be higher than the previous highest amount. Automatically detects overbidding (>150% of last SOOM).

parameters.name: listingId
parameters.description: ID of the listing to submit SOOM for

401.description: Unauthorized - User must be logged in

message.example: Unauthorized. User must be logged in.

enum: Submissions are not allowed for this listing.
Sellers cannot submit SOOMs on their own listings.
message.example: Submissions are not allowed for this listing.

422.description: Validation error or amount too low

message.example: The SOOM amount must be at least 1501.

get.summary: Get all SOOMs for a specific listing
get.description: Retrieve all SOOM submissions for a specific listing, ordered by amount (highest first)

parameters.name: listingId
parameters.description: ID of the listing to get SOOMs for

get.summary: Get minimum SOOM amount for a listing
get.description: Get the minimum amount required for a new SOOM submission based on current highest bid

403.description: Submissions not allowed for this listing

message.example: Submissions are not allowed for this listing.

patch.description: Accept a specific SOOM submission and automatically reject all other pending SOOMs for the same listing

parameters.name: submissionId
parameters.description: ID of the submission to accept

message.example: Unauthorized. User must be logged in.
Only the seller can accept SOOMs for this listing.
This SOOM has already been accepted.

patch.description: Reject a specific SOOM submission with optional rejection reason

parameters.name: submissionId
parameters.description: ID of the submission to reject

reason.example: Price too low for current market conditions

rejection_reason.example: Price too low for current market conditions

message.example: Unauthorized. User must be logged in.

403.description: Access denied or cannot reject validated sale

enum: Only the seller can reject SOOMs for this listing.
Cannot reject a SOOM with validated sale.
message.example: Only the seller can reject SOOMs for this listing.
This SOOM has already been rejected.

post.summary: Validate a sale after SOOM acceptance
post.description: Validate a sale for an accepted SOOM within 5 days of acceptance. Only sellers can validate sales.

parameters.name: submissionId
parameters.description: ID of the accepted submission to validate

401.description: Unauthorized - User must be logged in

message.example: Unauthorized. User must be logged in.

enum: Only the seller can validate sales for this listing.
Only accepted SOOMs can be validated.
message.example: Only the seller can validate sales for this listing.

422.description: Validation period expired or already validated

message.example: This sale has already been validated.
Validation period has expired. You had 5 days to validate this sale.

enum: You can only cancel your own SOOM submissions.
You can only cancel pending SOOM submissions.

parameters.name: submissionId
parameters.description: ID of the submission to edit

enum: You can only edit your own SOOM submissions.
You can only edit pending SOOM submissions.

422.description: Validation error or amount too low

allow_submission.description: Whether to allow new SOOM submissions

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the user was soft deleted (null if not deleted)
